aboutMe: Hi, I am Caíque, I was born at February 1, 1994. I have a degree in Computer Science at Universidade Federal de Goiás and I am currently a fullstack developer. My first contact with programming was around the age of 12 when I discovered that I could modify certain behaviors of a game I played by writing some instructions, it fascinated me and made me choose my course in college. I don't really like to limit myself to being a developer of X language/technology because I always like to be learning new things so if I have a problem and I need to develop a solution using a specific technology, even if I haven't had contact with that technology, for me it is not a problem: I will study it until I feel comfortable enough to use it in the solution. Currently JavaScript/TypeScript (and its entire stack) is my preferred choice.
